name: Balloon Party
description:
Eric and Ryan get lost while camping with some friends. They stumble upon a creepy town filled with balloons. What could possibly go wrong?

Controls: Arrow keys move, hold shift to run, Escape to go to the menu and save screen.

Balloon party is a short adventure game featuring two unique branching paths. If you have any questions or feedback please hit me up at immortallen@gmail.com

UPDATE 1/14/2016

VERSION 1.2

Significant content has been added to one of the endings.

Miscellaneous bugs have been fixed.

If you find any errors or bugs please contact me.
